website_summaries.verdict: Sporty detail give this set a fresh, energetic feel that is perfect for days or nights around the house.
pros: Comfortable cotton/polyester blend with athletic styling
Pants have elastic waist with drawstring closure and taper at ankle
Come in several colors stylish colors
cons: May run small - consider ordering a full size up

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed with Quality for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this pajama set, its adorable, comfortable and it fit perfectly true to size. I wore this set one time, hand washed per instructions and the next time I went to wear it, the elastic band in the waist got folded down awkwardly and the pants leg had seams that are already coming undone. I don't know how to sew but imagine for someone who does it isn't a hard fix. Now I have pants sitting in the drawer that need to be repaired after one wash, which, let's face it, I will probably never do. Not worth the money. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: M also fits up to 132lbs but fits 118lbs also.
customer_reviews.text: I still love them, they changed length sence my last 3 prs. So pant length would probably be good up to 5'5''. I have 5pr of M, I am 5'3'' 118lbs and was 132lbs an the M also fit nicely. Comfy cotton, washes well on cold an dry no more than 20 min on Low if only items. Keep eye on, can shrink if you don't. They have summer sweats and heavier without t-shirts. I like the knit cotton summery material in winter as well, that come with the t-shirts. Read description below item, you will know if cotton knit or thicker cotton. Both so nice!! T-shirt cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Tams

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat these comfy pjs for the price. Hard to show the pants taking a selfie. But super soft and I bought another pair plus a pair for my girl and we love them I am 5'11 and 140pds. I got a large but gave them to her and kept the extra large and they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CHASTITY

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'3" it fits perfect, I am 118lbs
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3''; it fits perfect, I am 118lbs. I bought size M-USA there is plenty xtra at ankle for taller woman. I know it fits 132lbs also because I was. T-shirt nice too an not form fit, I have room in it. Waist band elastic an draw string, fits above or below belly button. Summer/Spring/Fall lighter cotton 60% /40% polyester. Soft...washed several times an dried w other clothes on LOW at 40 min., dry at 20 min if only item in dryer, keep eye on. Looks great still. Never wash sweats in hot water or dry on hot settings anyway! Lol Love mine..a peach color an white peach top.
customer_reviews.author: Tams

customer_reviews.title: Comfy affordable pjs, must have!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what i wanted, comfy pajamas not too tight or too big. I am 5'1" 175lbs. These pants have a loose fit ankle elastic and soft waistband. The fabric is super soft! I love these and will be buying another pair. I purchased the pink polo top and dark grey pants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict!

customer_reviews.title: not for petites but very nice set. made well
customer_reviews.text: not for petites but very nice set. made well, great material, but pants are very long, and tank long as well. looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: R Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Soft slightly long pants - Fake drawstrings
customer_reviews.text: The pants are very soft, and a little bit long, which I love. I followed the sizing guidance/advice and bought a large, even though I usually wear a size 6, and the waist is a little too big. The drawstrings are fake (why have fake draw strings?!?), so I can't tighten it. Other than that, it's a great set of pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST PERFECT **JUST MAYBE NOT TRUE-TO-SIZE**
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm giving these pj's 4 stars instead of 5 is because of the fit. Fortunately, I ordered a medium which really should have been looser on me (the pants, that is). The top does fit like a medium though. These are very soft and comfortable and I really like the style. I can even wear them as lounge wear around the house (when no one is here that is). They're almost perfect. Ladies, you may want to go up one size because I'm 5'6", about 100 lbs. (at the most) and I have almost no hips...just very long & skinny legs. But, I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Go by measurements on size chart.
customer_reviews.text: The material is soft. A small amount of shrinkage when washed in cold water and hung to dry. You will need to block and stretch the shirt. The shirt is a little shorter then I would like about 27" the inseam is about 31". I wish the size charts would list shirt length and inseam. The 1x is really a size fourteen. I am 5'9" and weigh 194lbs, I carry most of my weight in my upper body, I have skinny legs and hips. The sets (I ordered 3 sets) are very well made. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Linda E

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric, funny sizing
customer_reviews.text: Per other reviews, I got a medium (usually a small or extra small). The top fits well and a small may have been too tight for my liking. The pants fit at the waist but I had to cut down the string tie - it was sooooo long. Excessive really - I probably would have gotten tangled in my sleep. The pants are also long (I'm only 5'4"). I'll hem them eventually they aren't an immediate concern
customer_reviews.author: KylieMomma

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’5” and 130 lbs the Mediums fit like a glove. I usually prefer roomier pajamas but these are comfy enough to be fine the way they are. Hoping they don’t shrink in the wash. UPDATE: After one wash, in cold, the pants shrunk a bit. Not horrible but bad enough that I have to keep tugging the legs down.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is PERFECT! Exactly as shown in pictures and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lidelalive

customer_reviews.title: Thin material & fit is different than picture
customer_reviews.text: Cute style, but shirt is too short for my body type. In the picture it appears to be a full length shirt but it is much shorter. Material is thin & have to wear a bra under it or an under shirt. A little concerned that they may fall apart too soon, but will see. Bought some sweats by the same brand & had a hole on the side stitching after a couple times of wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable pajamas.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely size up if you're thinking about ordering these. I normally wear a large in most things but glad I listened to size up advice. For reference I'm 5'6, 36b, 31in waist and 44in hip. I ordered the x-large. They are very comfortable and have ordered a couple more pairs. My only complaint is that the shirt is cut short, so I'm not a huge fan of the length. Had I not dried them in the dryer it would've been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Boymomxs2

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size larger than normal and they are still extremely tight. Especially the pants. Not much stretch in them. Material is not soft but scratchy. I doubt these are genuine Polo.
customer_reviews.author: Review Girl

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase....fortunate to be able to get discounted but good buy. Colour & quality is exactly what your see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Just order a size up if you are a woman.  It feels like it had a junior fit
customer_reviews.text: It’s gorgeous and comfy! It does run small! Beware I am a size 7 and normally wear small or medium but I read the reviews and I ordered a large and it fit perfectly so definitely order a size up
customer_reviews.author: Alison Kerr-estes

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and cute, ordered another set. !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and can lounge around the house without looking like you're in your pajamas. I loved them so much, ordered another set. Highly recommend. I don't like anything tight on me when I sleep so I ordered an x large, and glad I did. Any other size would have been too small, so runs small.
customer_reviews.author: A.Corley

customer_reviews.title: Wish there were more colors!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas! The pants are super comfy and could be worn out of the house as joggers if wanted. The matching tee is lightweight, which makes it great for sleeping. It’s not super long, which I prefer and the v-neck is just enough to be flattering, but as a chesty person, I’m not falling out of it at night! :) I’m 5’1” and 135lbs, I ordered a Large and it fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This lounge suit is awesome !! It’s well made , soft cotton . It fits just right , snugs your curves perfectly ! I bough to lounge in , during this quarantine I don’t sleep in it, but if I wanted to it would be perfect to sleep in too and even to wear out to the grocery store . Just throw on some tennis shoes and ur good to go !
customer_reviews.author: Mobilett

customer_reviews.title: Too tight to sleep in - very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This pj set came with a top that was large and shapeless and bottoms that were skin tight. If you have ever slept in a pair of pj bottoms that rode up and clinched you in the bed, you know that tight pj bottoms are worthless for sleeping. Sent them to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Rainfall

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This was a really cute set but disappointed because the bottoms were not 100% cotton and then the top fit, but the bottoms were very smll. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gary

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these and they were so pretty! However, when i got the pants out they had a hole on the side. I couldn’t even wear them :/ highly disappointed in the quality of this product. Now i need to find new pjs to order again 🙄 wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: POLO RIDES AGAIN TO VICTORY!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! THIS FIT PERFECT AND AS EXPECTED WITH THIS BRAND, MATERIAL IS SO SOFT, WELL MADE. I WOULD HAVE ORDERED MORE, BUT NOT AVAILABLE IN MY SIZE. BUMMER. AM ENJOYING THESE. WASHES WELL, PUT ON LOW HEAT IN DRYER. WONDERFUL. AS SOON AS I SEE MY SIZE POP UP, I WILL BUY IN EVERY COLOR. YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Shirt shrinks a LOT
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute but when I washed them my shirt shrunk so much that it was above my belly button. Prior to the wash you couldn’t see the bottom of the waistline on the pajama pants. I still wear the pants but I just throw on a tank top with them.
customer_reviews.author: venus reed

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable...but shrinks!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these when I tried them in before washing. The fit was great. I washed/dried them and the shirt shrunk A LOT. The pants seemed the same as when I tried them on. They are 100% cotton, which would be a good thing for breathability, but I was surprised how much the shirt shrunk on a normal dryer setting. I would recommend buying a size larger than you normally wear. Otherwise, they are very cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really Ralph Lauren but nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do love these pjs. I purchased 4 pair and the are so comfortable but the run small I’m 5’6. I weigh 137 an a XL fit just right. They don’t need harsh washing the delicate cycle and you can stretch them out while wet or just out of the dryer. They are not RALPH LAUREN
customer_reviews.author: Valencia Steed

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute on my niece. She loves the color and the fit and has worn them a few time already, since receiving them a week ago. They are soft and she is 5’6” and 105 lbs and extra small fits with a bit of room for sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Prince

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality PJs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! They fit perfectly and the colors are vibrant. I hope they hold up and last. Very rarely do I find cute and cozy PJs that I like and fit well. Great for petite curvy people. Excellent price point. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Runs too small, really warm
customer_reviews.text: I’m always a medium in pajamas and since this said it was true to size I got a medium and they are too tight. Everywhere. They look beautiful but they ripped at the seams the first day. Also it should be noted that they’re very very warm. It’s currently summer so that should be noted.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzy

customer_reviews.title: Must be a Polo thing
customer_reviews.text: Must be a Polo thing. Way too small. Order at least 2 sizes up. I normally wear a large in comfy bottoms like these and they are loose. I decided to go an XL just for added space. XL fits more like a medium. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby S.

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I’m 29 years old and figured it was probably time I stopped wearing big T-shirt’s and sweats every night to bed and wear actual pajamas so I’m so glad I found these. Best pajamas I’ve bought in a long time! Super cute and comfortable, great fit! I also bought a shorts set from the same company and loved them too
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Color of item looks different in person than ad
customer_reviews.text: The color of the shirt is not the same shade of pink and gray to me. It looks different in person. I wore this outfit once and washed it and got a hole in the crotch so I don't think it is the best quality. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jess C

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed I would purchase again but not for $17.99 the pants were not stitched properly. It seems as if it was a reject from the factory.I would gladly accept a refund or better yet another replacement of another color I have 4 more in my cart but I am not purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, top is transparent...
customer_reviews.text: The pants are sized somewhat small and material is soft. The shirt is not as long as in the picture, it hits really high, not as short as a half shirt, but close. The shirt is see through and not as soft as the pants.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Damage after washing it
customer_reviews.text: When you first see is good but once you wash it, it loses its form, the t-shirt is now a crop top and the elastic waist band on the pants is all wrinkle and very uncomfortable is only good for 1 use after 1 wash damage
customer_reviews.author: D.M.M

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and fit
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable, stylish, and fit. Unfortunately, the color is different from that in the picture. I expected grey with white, but it comes with pink. That is why I gave a four stars. I decided to keep it as it is not easy to find stylish sleep wear with soft cotton or cotton blend.
customer_reviews.author: Ann  X

customer_reviews.title: Run small...
customer_reviews.text: They run small. Before you order this my suggestion would be to buy a size up. I’m a large I bought a large and it fits quite snug. The material is nice and soft and they do stretch. Not true to size
customer_reviews.author: Max Attar

customer_reviews.title: GOT TO BUY THESE! AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'11 and 140pds and I ordered a large but gave it to my GF cause I wanted and XL. And its perfect, they are so cute and comfy. Thinner than another pair I got in pink n grey but I would definitely recommend. Cant believe the price is so either. Worth more!
customer_reviews.author: CHASTITY

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, reliable brand. Not expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Sooo comfy. Not to mention adorable. I love Ralph Lauren's U.S. Polo attire. Great lined sweatshirts too, I bought for my kids and I. Never dissatisfied with Polo. Even my microfiber Ralph Lauren sheet's are my new favorite, more so than any of my Egyptian cotton ones, that says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley G

customer_reviews.title: Great Pj's
customer_reviews.text: Bought for upcoming trip wanted something in a longer pants style and lightweight for the hotel room which sometimes gets a little chilly. Very well made very happy with my purchase would bye again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Conners

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: The pants are very flattering and comfortable. The top fits good and flows nicely. It does not cling to my rolls (hides them well). I am 5’4 and 164 lbs. I would definitely order more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Saved by the bell

customer_reviews.title: Fit according to size.  Giftable. Perfect for around the house or errand running.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, comfortable and a step above around the house clothing. These were a gift for someone who is quite tall and they still fit her the way they're supposed to. Colors have survived two washings.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Nice product made with lightweight material. Only drawback is I usually wear Large. I ordered XL to be safe. This style runs small but that's okay. I can pass it on to someone. Really pretty color!!
customer_reviews.author: JBM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome outfit for day or night!
customer_reviews.text: I wear this outfit as a casual run around in daytime or nighttime choice. The first time I wore it I got a couple of compliments on it too! I love it and it’s very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough to wear outside
customer_reviews.text: This Pajama pant set was awesome, soft and so comfortable that you forget that it is a pajama set wear it outside. I will be purchasing a couple more and the fit was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TLesa C.

customer_reviews.title: Just as I like
customer_reviews.text: I like these pjs very much, the pants are just a little oversized, not too tight as I was afraid they might be by the picture. I like the pants to be a little big for sleep comfort. I would have given 5 stars if they were softer feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Suerose

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I love the PJ set but it runs small... and the shirt is much shorter in length then the picture shows. It’s comfortable if you don’t mind a tight fit but unless your able to get 2 or 3 sizes up from your actual size it will not fit loose like the picture shows unless your built small... of course... 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Joette Winberry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, soft , good size, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Soft , original , very light and good quality True to size. Same as in the pic ,It arrived fast Thanks colors are great . Follow the wash and dry instructions . Gift so came on time.
customer_reviews.author: HeleofTroy

customer_reviews.title: Pj or Outfit!! Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pj set. I wore as a every day out for and no one could tell the difference. Only issue I had was the elastic band around waist folds and rolls out of place. Minor issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early and look just like the picture. I love how light weight they are and they make my butt look AMAZING! I wish there were more colors available in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Delorce F

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pajamas for my mom for her birthday.She liked them but said I needed to get her a size up.My mom is very thin so I thought medium would be ok but a large would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Style
customer_reviews.text: I love my new PJs. It' very comfortable and stylish. I recommend it to anyone looking for an inexpensive pair of pajamas. Can also be used as lounge wear.
customer_reviews.author: dharma

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The shirt is perfect and thick. Now the pants are so small and thin that all your imperfections show thru. I feel like the pants are smaller than the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Order a larger size.
customer_reviews.text: It shows a medium quality to the naked eye, however at the first wash the shirt shrunk a couple of sizes, which makes it unusable. The pants also shrunken, although not in such a serious way.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco J. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other polo pants/pjs I've gotten these were a little short. Fit a bit snug. I order up a size because I like my pjs baggy and comfortable. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pixie

customer_reviews.title: Sized wrong
customer_reviews.text: I take a size large, I ordered 2 sizes up 1X . And they look like a small very disappointed and I just got out of the hospital a few weeks ago and I can’t return them, so I guess I’ll have to find someone else who can fit in them !!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Higgins

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: runs small ,but wife says it'snice and soft feeling, top shrank when washed as directed pants not as light as expected feels a little on the heavier side
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer SHS

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRUE THE SIZE RUNS SMALL!!!'
customer_reviews.text: The pajama looks cute but they are not true to size, I ordered my size which is 3XL but was soooo tight & very uncomfortable so I ended up giving it kto someone at a smaller size definitely not for plus size!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NE/AL

customer_reviews.title: Nice PJ Set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife for a sleepover with her sisters. She absolutely loves the set. Found them very comfortable. She will be looking for more.
customer_reviews.author: Sog Deuce

customer_reviews.title: bottoms are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Ok, the top gets stretched out and is of poor quality but the bottoms are awesome and still comfortable. 5 stars on the pants 2 stars on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Chooliki

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome loungewear. Planning to get more. Very comfortable and soft for around the house or even running errands. I'm 5'1 , 126lb and got an M.
customer_reviews.author: A. A

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool and comfy.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for Summertime. They are light and comfortable, fits well, and no tags or seams that irritate. Very pleased with my new jammies. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: K. Holzman

customer_reviews.title: Pants are great, shirt not so much
customer_reviews.text: This pajama is pretty nice except the shirt shrank in the wash. The pants are just fine but for some reason the shirt shrank. It also looks “worn out” after the first wash which is unfortunate. The bottoms are amazing and super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Ayah Allam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pajamas
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy to sleep in. I bought bigger size because i like my pajamas to be loose on me. The pants are little long but i dont mind, i am short and i am used to pants being long
customer_reviews.author: Kornelija Dunojute

customer_reviews.title: Wash and soft
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. If you like super loose look you may want to go up a half size 😉 but all in all they got just right and are so soft. They wash well to.
customer_reviews.author: Eda

customer_reviews.title: I'm ordering another
customer_reviews.text: Suprisingly this darn out fit works for me. I've worn it twice. Fit is truer to size than anything else I've purchased on here. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: EJC

customer_reviews.title: Great Pajama and Lounge Set
customer_reviews.text: The U.S. Polo Assn. Womens Short Sleeve Shirt and Long Pajama Pants Sleepwear Set provided by this Amazon.com Seller is so comfortable and washes up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, just wish the pants where a bit longer, I’m 5’6 but am all legs, it’s fine for around the house, the top is really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Susie c

customer_reviews.title: Cute outfit, soft and good fit.
customer_reviews.text: The bottoms look exactly like the sweats they make except it's a thinner material for sleeping, love them, I'm 5"7 plenty long like I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought compared to the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: The pants were longer than I expected which is great because my daughter is very tall. But the shirt is shorter than I hoped for. But overall, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these.......and they fit true to size, I love them! I just ordered 2 more sets, love them. I’ve ordered the jogger pants before and they always fit great so I thought I would take a chance on the shirt and pants. Pants are very similar to joggers just a tad thinner but still really nice, I will definitely be ordering more!!
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 22 year old daughter for Christmas. She liked them and even commented that she like to buy a different color for herself. They fit just right. The pants are slightly long but they have elastic around the ankle so it's not an issue; also taking into consideration there may be shrinkage with the first wash. Overall, I'm satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelica

customer_reviews.title: Shrinks in every wash
customer_reviews.text: Shrunk from the first wash and then continued to shrink. It also wasn't as soft as I exoected pajamas to be.
customer_reviews.author: C. Heinz

customer_reviews.title: Top Short and Small
customer_reviews.text: The top was very short and small. Pant was tight, but they are not meant to be baggy. I went by the size chart. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Connell Acres

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I can not possibly wear these PJ's the material is so uncomfortable and scratchy. I would have liked to have been able to return them but I washed them prior to wearing
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: May run just a tad small, if you are looking for a looser fit, like pictured. Overall a great purchase, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bojana Milutinovic

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: The pj set is very nice. However ran larger than i expected and when I washed it for the first time, the bottoms ripped. Occurs lots of hols on bottom. Disappointed ☹️.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Terrible material and sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The pjs set looks cute but it’s not at all. I washed it right after receiving it before i even wear it as I always do, and surprisingly it shrank a size do the top is no a crop top with an angled sides. The quality is really bad not even worth $1. Save your money all us polo pjs are of the worst quality.
customer_reviews.author: Samar Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits far better than expected! The top is a little short but that's ok I'll just be sleeping in it. The bottoms fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Maribeth Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible top, pants are just "OK"
customer_reviews.text: The top is awful, fits weird and is cheaply made. The pants could be a lot softer! They both run very small!
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: These are great feeling pajamas that are so comfortable and cute. They run small. Order a size larger than needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Its worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for leasure or sleeping in. Light weight but still provides a bit of warmth. I'm happy I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Apryl H.

customer_reviews.title: US Polo Pajamas
customer_reviews.text: This pajama set is too cute. It seemed a little bigger than I expected, but not so bad that I sent it back. I kinda wish the top had long sleeves, but still a cute set without them.
customer_reviews.author: NativeTXgirl

customer_reviews.title: Every timd they go on sale i buy more
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and intact. I alreadt have these in several colors because every time they go on sale i get more. As a big girl at 5 3 and 270, its often hard to find cute outfits like this. I got a 3x and it fits great but i do wish the shirt was longer.
customer_reviews.author: stacey sherry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable outfit. Great price. Wouldve liked if color was just as shown in pic, the shirt and lettering on pants is actually a rose pink not light pink.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, but size Large is more like a size Small. Then they sent me two if the same style out of 4 different styles. So that was a surprise.
customer_reviews.author: EG Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very soft.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this outfit and it’s sooo soft. But, the shirt was a little short, not nearly as long as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: I. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable except for the sleeves
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable except for the sleeves, I really don't care for stiching were the stripes are, they are a little tight and scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Phillips

customer_reviews.title: bad fabric quality
customer_reviews.text: disign and color is good but the fabric quality is too bad so thin which is bad for the reputation of the brand polo.
customer_reviews.author: Karina martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We bought a second pair for ourselves and several as gifts. So cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: cargoil

customer_reviews.title: Love love
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this! I even wear it as a lounge set. I am totally buying more. Fits as expected. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Irina H.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but runs Very small.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and good quality But runs very small. I ordered the size that is normally baggy on me and it's skin tight. Size up one or two sizes depending on how you like them to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely I swear.... Not worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size sent too small and not as cute as it looks. I won't be ordering this brand ever again from here!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use them to lounge around the house in the morning. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Deffective
customer_reviews.text: The product felt like used and the pants was deffective and had stain on it. I’m so disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shania

customer_reviews.title: Teen Girls Will Love These
customer_reviews.text: Perfect around the house attire! Ordered XL for 12/14. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality this is my second set going to get me another set..
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa Hughes

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daugther, 5'3" , skinny, preadolescent, and she loves it. Washed it but air dried it, don't want to risk it shrinking.
customer_reviews.author: Ana L Pino Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit as expected. Too small
customer_reviews.text: Love the set but it fits small. I’m not that big and 1x was got to give me extra room to move around in. Pants are tight and length is a little short. Top fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Wiggins

product_meta.title: U.S. Polo Assn. Womens Short Sleeve Shirt and Long Pajama Pants Sleepwear Set
feature_bullets: COORDINATED ENSEMBLE: This cute 2-piece pjs for women set includes a graphic V-Neck Short Sleeve lounge T shirt and pajama sweat pants in Heather*Grey for a coordinated look. The U.S. Polo Assn. brand name is printed down the length of the left leg while the signature horse and rider logo is printed on the center of the shirt for a stylish and sporty flair to this womens pajama set.

LONG SWEATPANTS: Short sleeve pajama set topped by an elastic waistband with drawstring, these long sweat pants feature elastic at the ankles for a comfy fit. An officially branded graphic along one leg adds athletic flair. The drawstring closure on these pajamas for women allows you to cinch the waist according to your preference and comfort level.

ELASTIC WAIST: The elastic waist ensures that your ladies pjs sets will remain securely on your hips, while the gathered elastic at the ankles prevents your ladies pajama pants from dragging on the floor or riding up allowing you greater freedom of movement. COLOR BLOCK: The two colors creates a nice contrast and adds a bit of dimension to your sleepwear.

ULTRA COMFORTABLE: The knit and super soft material feels as smooth and light as air against your skin. Perfect for sleeping or lounging around at home. Comfort should always be a top priority when choosing loungewear, and this total comfort pajama sleep set will quickly become one of your favorite pieces in your sleepwear wardrobe. When the only thing on your mind after a long day is relaxing at home, grab this lounge shirt and pants set and sink into pure bliss.

MIX AND MATCH: This pajama set for women pairs perfectly with everything thats already in your lounge sleep wear wardrobe, as well as our collection of luxe sleepwear separates. RUNS SMALL â€“ Please order a size up. Hand Wash, Line Dry. SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If you arenâ€t 100% in love with your pajama sleepwear set, know that weâ€re happy to refund your order with our 30-day money back guarantee.
